languages.text: "Говори, куда отправился Ксавьер, и будешь жить. Он же тебя бросил".
"Tell me where Calcazar has gone and you will live. Don't you see he has abandoned you?"
languages.original_text: "Говори, куда отправился Ксавьер, и будешь жить. Он же тебя бросил".

traits.locale_text: "Tell me where Xavier has gone and you will live. Don't you see he has abandoned you?"
"Tell me where Xavier has gone and you will live. Don't you see he has abandoned you?"
"Tell me where Xavier has gone and you will live. Don't you see he has abandoned you?"
"Tell me where Xavier has gone and you will live. Don't you see he has abandoned you?"
"Tell me where Calcazar has gone and you will live. Don't you see he has abandoned you?"
"Tell me where Calcazar has gone and you will live. Don't you see he has abandoned you?"

languages.text: “只要告诉我卡尔卡扎去了哪里，我就饶你一命。他抛弃了你，难道你看不出来吗？”
languages.original_text: "Tell me where Calcazar has gone and you will live. Don't you see he has abandoned you?"

traits.locale_text: “只要告诉我希维尔去了哪里，我就饶你一命。他抛弃了你，难道你看不出来吗？”

languages.text: 「カルカサルの行方を言えば命だけは助けてやる。分からないのか？お前はあいつに見捨てられたんだぞ？」
languages.original_text: "Tell me where Calcazar has gone and you will live. Don't you see he has abandoned you?"

traits.locale_text: 「シャビエルの行方を言えば命だけは助けてやる。分からないのか？お前はあいつに見捨てられたんだぞ？」

languages.text: «Dígame dónde está Calcazar y vivirá. ¿No ve que le ha abandonado?».
languages.original_text: "Tell me where Calcazar has gone and you will live. Don't you see he has abandoned you?"

traits.locale_text: «Dígame dónde está Xavier y vivirá. ¿No ve que le ha abandonado?».

languages.text: "Sagt mir, wo Calcazar ist, dann lebt Ihr weiter. Erkennt Ihr denn nicht, dass er Euch im Stich gelassen hat?"
languages.original_text: "Tell me where Calcazar has gone and you will live. Don't you see he has abandoned you?"

traits.locale_text: "Sagt mir, wo Xavier ist, dann lebt Ihr weiter. Erkennt Ihr denn nicht, dass er Euch im Stich gelassen hat?"

languages.text: « Dites-moi où est parti Calcazar et je vous laisserai la vie sauve. Ne voyez-vous pas qu'il vous a abandonné ? »
languages.original_text: "Tell me where Calcazar has gone and you will live. Don't you see he has abandoned you?"

traits.locale_text: « Dites-moi où est parti Xavier et je vous laisserai la vie sauve. Ne voyez-vous pas qu'il vous a abandonné ? »
